title: The Wonder Smith and His Son: A Tale from the Golden Childhood of the World
description: Newbery Medal Honor Title (1928)14 stories of Gubbaun Saor, a mythological creature of Ireland have been retold from tales. The author heard from English and Gaelic storytellers. The stories captured the little cadence of the Irish language and are enhanced by the graphics. Retells the Celtic tale of the Gubbaun Saor, also known as Cullion the Smith, who made worlds, shaped universes, and created stars from the sparks of his anvil.
author: Ella Young
